description: A modern mobile news reader application that delivers the latest technology news, articles, and insights. Users can browse articles by category, bookmark favorites, discover new content, and personalize their reading experience with dark mode and category preferences.

targetUsers.description: Software developers, engineers, and IT professionals who need to stay updated with industry trends
needs: Quick access to latest tech news

targetUsers.description: Technology lovers who enjoy reading about gadgets, innovations, and tech culture
CTOs, tech leads, and executives who need tech insights for business decisions

coreValueProposition: TechNews Daily provides a curated, personalized, and efficient way to stay informed about technology news with features designed for modern mobile consumption patterns.

coreFeatures.name: Article Feed
coreFeatures.description: Browse latest technology articles with pull-to-refresh functionality

coreFeatures.name: Featured Articles
coreFeatures.description: Horizontally scrollable featured article section on home screen

coreFeatures.name: Article Categories
coreFeatures.description: Browse articles by technology categories (AI, Mobile, Web, etc.)

coreFeatures.name: Article Detail View
coreFeatures.description: Full article reading experience with images, author info, and metadata

coreFeatures.name: Bookmark System
coreFeatures.description: Save and manage favorite articles for offline reading

coreFeatures.name: Discovery Feed
coreFeatures.description: Explore trending articles and discover new content

coreFeatures.name: User Profile & Preferences
coreFeatures.description: Customize app settings, dark mode, notification preferences

coreFeatures.name: Share Articles
coreFeatures.description: Share articles via social media and messaging apps

coreFeatures.name: Search Functionality
coreFeatures.description: Search articles by title, content, or author

coreFeatures.name: Push Notifications
coreFeatures.description: Breaking news alerts and personalized content notifications

userStories.story: As a tech professional, I want to quickly browse the latest technology news so that I can stay informed about industry developments during my commute
acceptanceCriteria: Articles are sorted by publication date

userStories.story: As a tech enthusiast, I want to bookmark interesting articles so that I can read them later when I have more time
acceptanceCriteria: Bookmark button is easily accessible on each article
Bookmarks screen shows all saved articles

userStories.story: As a tech professional, I want to filter articles by category so that I can focus on topics relevant to my work
acceptanceCriteria: Category filter is available on discover screen
Categories include AI, Mobile, Web, Security, etc.

userStories.story: As a business decision maker, I want to read full articles with author information so that I can assess the credibility of the content
acceptanceCriteria: Author name and bio are displayed
Publication date and read time are shown

userStories.story: As a tech enthusiast, I want to discover trending articles so that I can explore new topics and technologies
As a tech professional, I want to share interesting articles with colleagues so that we can discuss industry trends
acceptanceCriteria: Share button is available on article detail
Native share menu opens with options
Article URL and title are included
Share action is tracked for analytics

userStories.story: As a tech enthusiast, I want to customize my reading experience with dark mode so that I can read comfortably in different lighting conditions
acceptanceCriteria: Dark mode toggle in profile settings

criteria: Articles load within 3 seconds on 4G connection
Skeleton loading states are shown during fetch
Error states are handled gracefully with retry options
Tab navigation is intuitive and responsive
Deep linking to articles works correctly
All interactive elements have accessibility labels

limitations: React Native and Expo framework requirements
iOS 13.0+ and Android API level 21+ minimum support
App bundle size should remain under 50MB
Offline functionality limited to cached content

considerations: MVP delivery target: 8 weeks from development start
App store review process: 2-7 days per platform

requirements: App Store and Google Play Store guidelines compliance

limitations: Dependency on external news API availability

risks.mitigation: Implement fallback content sources and robust error handling
Establish content curation process and user feedback system
Implement lazy loading, image optimization, and caching strategies
Focus on user onboarding experience and feature discovery

assumptions: Users have reliable internet connectivity for initial content load
Technology news content will be available through API or RSS feeds
Users are familiar with standard mobile app navigation patterns
Push notification permissions will be granted by significant user percentage
